cAddressToPAddress(address).details: Queries the P-chain address for given C-chain address.

params._cAddress: The C-chain address for which corresponding P-chain address will be retrieved.

pAddressToCAddress(bytes20).details: Queries the C-chain address for given P-chain address.

params._pAddress: The P-chain address for which corresponding C-chain address will be retrieved.

params._publicKey: Public key from which addresses to register are derived from.
Public key from which addresses to register are derived from.

registerPublicKey(bytes).notice: Register P-chain and C-chain addresses derived from given public key.
